CustomField.description: Used for Custom Activity Timeline only. Use to display fields from object's compact layout as details (the compact layout corresponds to the fields on the highlights panel at the top of the record).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Custom Activity Timeline only. Use to display fields from object's compact layout as details (the compact layout corresponds to the fields on the highlights panel at the top of the record).
CustomField.label: Display Compact Layout
